organisation_name: IrRADIARE, Investigação e Desenvolvimento em Engenharia e Ambiente, Lda (IrRADIARE)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: IrRADIARE advises public authorities, urban, regional and local, on innovation, financing, funding, technology and procurement, and on European relations.
